episodes.title: In Praise of Pip
episodes.plot: A wearied bookie, learning of his grown soldier son Pip dying in South Vietnam, gets to spend one last delightful hour with a ten-year-old version of him at an amusement park.

episodes.title: Steel
episodes.plot: In 1974, boxing has been outlawed and is performed by mechanical robots. With his next and possibly last fight approaching and his robot in need of repair, he resorts to one last desperate gamble.

episodes.title: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
episodes.plot: A man, newly recovered from a nervous breakdown, becomes convinced that a monster only he sees is damaging the plane he's flying in.

episodes.title: A Kind of a Stopwatch
episodes.plot: A man is given a stopwatch that halts time.

episodes.title: The Last Night of a Jockey
episodes.plot: A washed-up jockey gets his wish while waiting for the results of his race fixing hearing.

episodes.title: Living Doll
episodes.plot: A frustrated father does battle with his stepdaughter's talking doll, whose vocabulary includes such phrases as "I hate you" and "I'm going to kill you".

episodes.title: The Old Man in the Cave
episodes.plot: In a post-apocalyptic settlement in 1974, the inhabitants' survival is dependent on the advice of an unseen man living in a nearby cave. This dependence is tested when a band of soldiers descends on their town.

episodes.title: Uncle Simon
episodes.plot: Caregiver Barbara Polk receives a surprise after her uncle's death.

episodes.title: Probe 7, Over and Out
episodes.plot: Colonel Cook, stranded on another planet with no hope for rescue, meets a woman who is the sole survivor from another planet.

episodes.title: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms
episodes.plot: On June 25, 1964, three Army National Guard soldiers on maneuvers near the Little Big Horn battle site find themselves unwittingly involved in Custer's Last Stand.

episodes.title: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
episodes.plot: An aging married man convinces his brother to inject him with a youth serum.

episodes.title: Ninety Years Without Slumbering
episodes.plot: An old man believes that his life will end the moment his grandfather clock stops ticking.

episodes.title: Ring-A-Ding Girl
episodes.plot: Movie star Bunny Blake receives a ring from her hometown which is giving her warnings to come home while she flies cross country.

episodes.title: You Drive
episodes.plot: After being involved with a hit-and-run accident, which resulted in killing a child, Mr. Oliver Pope is haunted by his car.

episodes.title: The Long Morrow
episodes.plot: Before leaving on a decades-long mission, astronaut Douglas Stansfield meets a woman and falls in love.

episodes.title: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross
episodes.plot: Salvadore Ross has a unique talent where he can trade physical characteristics with other people and will do anything to get the love of Leah Maitland.

episodes.title: Number 12 Looks Just Like You
episodes.plot: In a future society, everyone must undergo an operation at age 19 to become beautiful and conform to society. One young woman desperately wants to hold onto her own identity.

episodes.title: Black Leather Jackets
episodes.plot: Three leather-jacket-wearing, motorcycle-riding men invade a peaceful neighborhood.

episodes.title: Night Call
episodes.plot: Telephone calls begin to haunt a disabled elderly woman.

episodes.title: From Agnes - with Love
episodes.plot: A computer technician begins to take advice for his love life from Agnes, the computer he works with.

episodes.title: Spur of the Moment
episodes.plot: An engaged heiress is terrorized by a middle-aged woman on a horse pleading with her not to go through with her impending marriage.

episodes.title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
episodes.plot: During the American Civil War in 1862, a condemned Confederate prisoner, Peyton Farquhar, is due to be hanged by Union troops.

episodes.title: Queen of the Nile
episodes.plot: A reporter interviews a Hollywood movie queen who has a secret to her eternal beauty.

episodes.title: What's in the Box
episodes.plot: Philanderer Joe Britt sees his indiscretions shown on his own TV set after it was worked on by a unique repairman.

episodes.title: The Masks
episodes.plot: Wealthy Jason Foster is dying and he invites his greedy heirs to a Mardi Gras party where they must wear the masks he specially had made for them or else be cut off from their inheritance.

episodes.title: I Am the Night - Color Me Black
episodes.plot: The Sun doesn't rise on a small town where an execution is scheduled to take place.

episodes.title: Sounds and Silences
episodes.plot: Roswell Flemington enjoys loud noises, is an annoyance to others and is suitably punished.

episodes.title: Caesar and Me
episodes.plot: When Irish ventriloquist Jonathan West cannot find any work, his dummy Caesar suggests that he turn to burglary.

episodes.title: The Jeopardy Room
episodes.plot: A defector is trapped in a hotel room and given three hours to find a hidden bomb.

episodes.title: Stopover in a Quiet Town
episodes.plot: A hung-over couple awaken to find themselves not only in a strange house, but in a deserted town, where nothing is as it should be.

episodes.title: The Encounter
episodes.plot: Post-WWII Hawaii. Two men of once-opposing races are stuck in an attic full of war trophies, including a samurai sword waiting to dutifully avenge its slain master.

episodes.title: Mr. Garrity and the Graves
episodes.plot: Mr. Garrity comes into town of Happiness, Arizona offering to resurrect the dead and reunite the townsfolk with their departed loved ones out of the goodness of his heart. Do the town-folks want these miracles to occur?

episodes.title: The Brain Center at Whipple's
episodes.plot: A heartless CEO completely automates his factory and lays off almost all of his workers over the objections of his employees.

episodes.title: Come Wander with Me
episodes.plot: Singer Floyd Burney searches the backwoods for new songs and finds Mary Rachel and much more deep in the Twilight Zone.

episodes.title: The Fear
episodes.plot: Charlotte Scott and state trooper Robert Franklin seem to be stalked by giants.

episodes.title: The Bewitchin' Pool
episodes.plot: Two children escape their bickering parents through a portal in the bottom of their swimming pool to a magical land watched over by a kind old woman the children call Aunt T.
